message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the enthusiasm! However, $120 is a bit above my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $90 at this time.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $120 might be a bit steep for you. However, I'm still very interested in selling this product to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. This is the lowest price I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great value for the product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise.  $110 is still a bit high for me. I'm happy to pay $100, which is my absolute top limit.  If you're not able to accept that, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand that $100 is your absolute top limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll meet you at $105, which is the lowest price I'm willing to accept. This is a great deal for both of us, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
